  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2967</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Shavuot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Shavuot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Shavuot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Shavuot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Shavuot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Shavuot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Shavuot</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit about the Jewish holiday -Shavuot.,when the 10 commandments were received. includes explanations, songs, recipes and customs for the holiday and more</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">10 commandments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">celebration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">customs</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit über den 
jüdischen Feiertag - Shavuot., als die 10 Gebote empfangen wurden, 
schließt Erklärungen, Liede, Rezepte und Gewohnheiten für den 
Feiertag und mehr ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive au sujet des 
vacances juives - Shavuot., quand les 10 commandements ont été 
reçus inclut des explications, des chansons, des recettes et des 
coutumes pour les vacances et plus</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa sobre o feriado 
jewish - Shavuot., quando os 10 commandments foram recebidos inclui 
explanações, canções, receitas e costumes para o feriado e mais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva circa la festa 
ebrea - Shavuot., quando i 10 ordini sono stati ricevuti include le 
spiegazioni, le canzoni, le ricette e le abitudini per la festa e 
più</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα για τις 
εβραϊκές διακοπές - Shavuot., όταν παραλήφθηκαν οι 10 εντολές
περιλαμβάνει τις εξηγήσεις, τα τραγούδια, τις συνταγές και το 
τελωνείο για τις διακοπές και περισσότερους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva sobre el día de
fiesta judío - Shavuot., cuando los 10 mandamientos fueron recibidos 
incluye explicaciones, canciones, recetas y los costumbres para el 
día de fiesta y más</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">10 Gebote</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
